name: Create a Table
description: Learn how to create a basic table with appropriate data types and constraints.

checks.name: Table 'users' exists
checks.query: SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name = 'users'

checks.name: Column 'id' exists with correct type
checks.query: SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'users' AND column_name = 'id'
checks.description: Column 'id' should be of type INTEGER

checks.name: Column 'username' exists with correct type
checks.query: SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'users' AND column_name = 'username'
checks.description: Column 'username' should be of type VARCHAR

checks.name: Column 'email' exists with correct type
checks.query: SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'users' AND column_name = 'email'
checks.description: Column 'email' should be of type VARCHAR

checks.name: Column 'created_at' exists with correct type
